Kindly assist with brand offer creatives in Raksha Bandhan theme for the
following brands.
Please refer to the ticket number added ahead to have the offer creative
reference

1. Sony - ticket 26459
2. Lg - ticket 26459
3. Samsung CE - ticket 26552
4. Samsung Mobile - ticket 26552

*May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes
you smile! ?*
*Vanshika Khurana*

body_text:
Hi Swati,

Please implement the below feedback :

1.Samsung 20k cashback : Use mobile and tablet both the visuals.
2.Bose 5k cashback: Put collage visuals - Find the visual links from the
website for reference.

https://www.boseindia.com/products/quietcomfort-ultra-headphones?variant=51451990180113
https://www.boseindia.com/products/soundlink-max-portable-speaker?variant=51438734082321
https://www.boseindia.com/products/soundlink-flex-2nd-gen?variant=51853640958225
https://www.boseindia.com/products/smart-soundbar?variant=51498511106321




Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.

Hi Swati,

Please implement the below feedback :

1.Samsung 20k cashback : Use mobile and tablet both the visuals. 
2.Bose 5k cashback: Put collage visuals - Find the visual links from the website for reference.

https://www.boseindia.com/products/quietcomfort-ultra-headphones?variant=51451990180113
https://www.boseindia.com/products/soundlink-max-portable-speaker?variant=51438734082321
https://www.boseindia.com/products/soundlink-flex-2nd-gen?variant=51853640958225
https://www.boseindia.com/products/smart-soundbar?variant=51498511106321




Regards,

Harish Chaduvula,
Mail id: harish.chaduvula@paytm.com
Mobile:8331897191.
